Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.datamanagement.cleanup

Class GitCleaner

java.lang.Object
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.datamanagement.cleanup.GitCleaner
public class GitCleaner extends Object
This class is a means to clean up unneeded files from the datalake. Execution is quite expensive as it will need to check all (potentially) accessible versions for all Tasks (Experiments and Projects do not store additional information.
Author:
Thomas Pfau

  • Constructor Details

    • GitCleaner

      public GitCleaner(io.vertx.ext.mongo.MongoClient client, io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx, ElementManager<Task> taskManager)
      Like the normal constructor but assumes a maxAge of 12 hours.
      Parameters:
      client - the mongoclient used for this cleaner (communication with db)
      vertx - the vertx instance the cleaner is running for
      taskManager - the ElementManager to use

    • GitCleaner

      public GitCleaner(io.vertx.ext.mongo.MongoClient client, io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx, ElementManager<Task> taskManager, long maxAge)
      Create a GitCleaner with a specified maxAge. The maxAge indicates how old a version can be to still be considered reachable for deletion purposes (i.e. we assume this could be under active work)
      Parameters:
      client - the mongoclient used for this cleaner (communication with db)
      vertx - the vertx instance the cleaner is running for
      taskManager - the ElementManager to use
      maxAge - a maxage before reloading data

  • Method Details

    • cleanTask

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Void> cleanTask(String taskID)
      Clean up a task. All Files and versions that are not accessible (via tags) or have been accessible will be removed from the task.
      Parameters:
      taskID - the task to clean up.
      Returns:
      a Future indicating if the
